SXLEMAP.description: Maps OpenClinica Data Export to SAS data structures.
SXLEMAP.name: OCEXPORT

COLUMN.name: AEYN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Were adverse events observed or reported

COLUMN.name: ACNOTH
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Counteractive medication, Medical/ Surgical intervention, Other specify/ Comments

COLUMN.name: row_number
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Row number of data in group

COLUMN.name: BRBCBYN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Was the subject able and willing to breathe into the breath collection bags

COLUMN.name: BSCOMPPROT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Was breath sampling completed according to protocol

COLUMN.name: BSSHIPCLDAT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Date breath samples shipped to central lab

COLUMN.name: BSSHIPCLNA_9
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Date breath samples shipped to central lab - Not Applicable - NA

COLUMN.name: BTRSTAT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Were the BreathID® Hp System results available

COLUMN.name: DOB1NE_0
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Delta Over Baseline - Non Evaluable - Non Evaluable

COLUMN.name: CLBTRPERF
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Were the BreathID® Hp Lab System Results available

COLUMN.name: CLBTRDOBNE_0
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Delta Over Baseline - Non Evaluable - Non Evaluable

COLUMN.name: row_number
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Row number of data in group

COLUMN.name: CMYN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Is subject currently taking any medication, or has taken any medication within 6 weeks prior to the breath/ stool test

COLUMN.name: row_number
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Row number of data in group

COLUMN.name: INCL01
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is older than 3 and younger than 18 years of age

COLUMN.name: INCL02
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject present with clinical indication compatible with H. pylori based on the judgement of the treating physician (such as abdominal pain, nausea, diarrhea, reflux, peptic ulcer, dyspepsia, etc., or following treatment for H.pylori)

COLUMN.name: INCL03
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject/ Legal guardian (and subject when relevant) is willing to sign the Informed Consent/ Assent Form

COLUMN.name: INCL04
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is naïve to H. pylori treatment in the past 6 weeks

COLUMN.name: EXCL01
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is participating in other interventional trials

COLUMN.name: EXCL02
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject has taken Proton Pump Inhibitors (PPIs) or H2 blockers within 2 weeks prior to breath test/ stool antigen test

COLUMN.name: EXCL05
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject has an allergy to the test substrate

COLUMN.name: EXCL06
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject has taken any antibiotics (not related to H. pylori eradication) and/ or bismuth preparations within 4 weeks prior to breath test

COLUMN.name: EXCL07
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject was exposed to any type of anesthesia, analgesics or sedation 24 hours prior to the breath test

COLUMN.name: EXCL08
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject was exposed to any 13C-enriched substance 24 hours prior to the breath test

COLUMN.name: EXCL09
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is 12 years and older - to be excluded after a written notification from the sponsor is received at the site that the limit of 1/3 of the sample size was achieved for this group

COLUMN.name: EXCL10
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is outside US - to be excluded after a written notification from the sponsor is received at the site that the limit of 1/3 of the sample size was achieved for this group

COLUMN.name: IEORRES
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Does the patient meet all inclusion/ exclusion criteria

COLUMN.name: ICSIGN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Did the patient's parent(s)/ legal guardian(s) sign an Informed Consent form

COLUMN.name: ICDT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Date of signing the Informed Consent

COLUMN.name: ICTIM1
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Time of signing the Informed Consent (Hours)

COLUMN.name: ICTIM2
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Time of signing the Informed Consent (Minutes)

COLUMN.name: ASSIGN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Did the patient sign an Assent form

COLUMN.name: INHPTINDC_4
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Indication(s) - Family history of gastric cancer

COLUMN.name: INHPTINDC_9
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Indication(s) - Bleeding in upper digestive tract

COLUMN.name: MH_NORM_1
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Nothing to report - Nothing to report

COLUMN.name: row_number
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Row number of data in group

COLUMN.name: SATTIMHR
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Time of stool sample collection - Hours

COLUMN.name: SATTIMMIN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Time of stool sample collection - Minutes

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_1
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Sample Storage condition until shipment - Room temperature

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_2
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Sample Storage condition until shipment - Refrigerated

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_3
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Sample Storage condition until shipment - Frozen

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_9
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Sample Storage condition until shipment - Other

COLUMN.name: SATRMTEMPHR
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Room temperature, specify the duration

COLUMN.name: SATFRHR
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Frozen, specify the duration and temperature - Duration

COLUMN.name: SATFRTEMP
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Frozen, specify the duration and temperature - Temperature

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_OTH
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Other, specify the storage condition and duration - Storage

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCON_OTHHR
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Other, specify the storage condition and duration - Duration

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCOND_ADD
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Is there additional information regarding sampling and storage conditions

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPCOND_ADDTERM
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Yes, please provide additional details including timeframes and temperatures

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPLOC
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Location from which sample was sent

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPSHDT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Clinical site, specify the shipping date

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPSHTIMHR
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Clinical site, specify the shipping time - Hours

COLUMN.name: SATSAMPSHTIMMIN
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Clinical site, specify the shipping time - Minutes

COLUMN.name: SDC01
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject did not fast during the last 1 hour prior to test

COLUMN.name: SDC02
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject has taken any antibiotics (not related to H. pylori eradication), bismuth preparations or treatment for H. pylori within the last 4 weeks)

COLUMN.name: SDC03
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject has taken any Proton Pump Inhibitors (PPIs) or H2 blockers within the last 2 weeks

COLUMN.name: SDC04
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Subject is not naïve to H. pylori treatment for the past 6 weeks

COLUMN.name: STAT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Did subject complete all study related procedures according to the protocol

COLUMN.name: STDT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If Yes, please specify Date of Completion

COLUMN.name: TERMDT
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: If No, please specify date of early termination

COLUMN.name: DECOD
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Reason for early termination of the study

COLUMN.name: TERM
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Reason for early termination of the study - Other, specify

COLUMN.name: study
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The study that the subject is enrolled in

COLUMN.name: study_site
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The site that the subject is enrolled in

COLUMN.name: group
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The group this subject belongs to

COLUMN.name: group_class
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The group class this group belongs to

COLUMN.name: study_site
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The site that the subject is enrolled in

COLUMN.name: thread_id
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The thread id for this discrepancy note.

COLUMN.name: parent_thread_id
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The parent thread id for this discrepancy note.

COLUMN.name: study_site
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The site that the subject is enrolled in

COLUMN.name: study_site
COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The site that the subject is enrolled in
